name: tModLoader
author: mindfang@taco.quest
description: tModLoader (TML) is an open-source, community-driven, modification and expansion of the Terraria game that makes it possible to make and play mods. TML expands your Terraria adventures with new content to explore created by the Terraria community! TML allows players to create and play Terraria mods and is designed in such a way so that you can play alone or together with friends, with one mod or with multiple mods: choose to play however you like! It is however required that all your friends also install TML if you want to play together; vanilla users can't play with TML users.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
HOME=/mnt/server
GREEN='\033[0;32m'

mkdir -p $HOME
cd $HOME

echo -e "Creating Steam subdirectories"
mkdir -p ${HOME}/.steam/{root,steam} && \

echo -e "Running Steam initial update"
steamcmd +quit

if [ -z "$VERSION" ] || [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading latest release"
    curl -sSL https://github.com/tModLoader/tModLoader/releases/latest/download/tModLoader.zip -O
else
    echo -e "Downloading version $VERSION of tModLoader"
    curl -sSL https://github.com/tModLoader/tModLoader/releases/download/${VERSION}/tModLoader.zip -O
fi

echo -e "Installing tModLoader"
unzip -o tModLoader.zip

echo -e "Downloading additional files"
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Gethec/Pterodactyl-Eggs/main/Terraria/tModLoader/startServer.sh -O
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Gethec/Pterodactyl-Eggs/main/Terraria/tModLoader/.pteroignore -O

echo -e "Creating content directories"
mkdir -p mods saves/Worlds

echo -e "Setting executables"
chmod +x ./DedicatedServerUtils/Setup_tModLoaderServer.sh ./LaunchUtils/ScriptCaller.sh start-tModLoaderServer.sh start-tModLoader.sh startServer.sh

echo -e "Cleaning up extra files"
rm tModLoader.zip

echo -e "${GREEN}Server installation complete!"
